pull.title: Fixed German translation
pull.body: There were some mistakes in the German translation, so I fixed them.

events.message: Fixed some mistakes in the German translation.

events.body: NACK, why did you change the spacing so much?
I didn't change the spacing, Poedit did this. This is because it's easier to read, I think. But why should the spacing be a problem?
It isnt, I was just nitpicking, and it makes the commitdiff much harder to read, which isnt good...also, my poedit doesn't do that unless I put spaces in there.
